title: SBT GRVL pro bike check: Russell Finsterwald’s Specialized S-Works Crux
content:
Russell Finsterwald shows off his SBT GRVL Crux, which featured a massive 50T chainring, aero road wheels, and alloy handlebars.

Read the full article at SBT GRVL pro bike check: Russell Finsterwald’s Specialized S-Works Crux on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
